searchSql.baseSql: select ca.PKID,sab.case_code,pi.property_addr,tab.guohu_time,sab.sum_base_amount,tab.paid_time from (select case_code,sum(base_amount) sum_base_amount from sctrans.t_ts_award_base <ifNotNull userId> where PARTICIPANT = #userId# </ifNotNull> group by case_code) sab inner join ( select * from ( select *, ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by case_code order by guohu_time desc) num from sctrans.t_ts_award_base <ifNotNull userId> where PARTICIPANT = #userId# </ifNotNull> ) t where t.num = 1 ) tab on sab.case_code = tab.case_code left join sctrans.t_to_property_info pi on tab.case_code = pi.case_code inner join sctrans.T_TO_CASE ca on ca.case_code = tab.case_code where 1 = 1 <if test="caseCode != null and caseCode != '' "> and sab.case_code = #caseCode# </if> <if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr != '' "> and pi.property_addr like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </if> <if test="paidTime != null and paidTime != '' " > and DATEDIFF(mm,tab.paid_time,#paidTime#) = 0 </if> <if test="dtBegin != null and dtBegin != '' " > and tab.guohu_time >= #dtBegin# </if> <if test="dtEnd != null and dtEnd != '' " > and tab.guohu_time < DATEADD(day,1,#dtEnd#) </if> order by guohu_time desc

SELECT A.SRV_CODE AS SRV_CODE_OLD , A.BASE_AMOUNT , A.SRV_PART_IN , A.SRV_PART_TOTAL , B.SATISFACTION , B.SRV_PART, C.AWARD_KPI_MONEY , D.FIN_ORDER , D.FIN_ORDER_ROLL, D.FIN_ORDER_RATE FROM sctrans.t_ts_award_base A LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY_DETAIL C ON A.PKID = C.AWARD_BASE_ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_RATE E ON c.KPI_RATE_ID = E.PKID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_KPI_SRV_CASE B ON E.SRV_CASE_ID = B.PKID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_KPI_PSN_MONTH D ON E.PSN_MONTH_ID = D.PKID where 1=1 <ifNotNull caseCode> AND A.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull userId> AND A.PARTICIPANT = #userId# </ifNotNull>

select ca.PKID,sab.case_code,pi.property_addr,tab.guohu_time,sab.sum_base_amount,tab.paid_time from (select case_code,sum(base_amount) sum_base_amount from sctrans.t_ts_award_base group by case_code) sab inner join ( select * from ( select *, ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by case_code order by guohu_time desc) num from sctrans.t_ts_award_base ) t where t.num = 1 ) tab on sab.case_code = tab.case_code left join sctrans.t_to_property_info pi on tab.case_code = pi.case_code inner join sctrans.T_TO_CASE ca on ca.case_code = tab.case_code where 1 = 1 <if test="caseCode != null and caseCode != '' "> and sab.case_code = #caseCode# </if> <if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr != '' "> and pi.property_addr like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </if> <if test="paidTime != null and paidTime != '' " > and DATEDIFF(mm,tab.paid_time,#paidTime#) = 0 </if> <if test="dtBegin != null and dtBegin != '' " > and tab.guohu_time >= #dtBegin# </if> <if test="dtEnd != null and dtEnd != '' " > and tab.guohu_time < DATEADD(day,1,#dtEnd#) </if> order by guohu_time desc

SELECT A.SRV_CODE AS SRV_CODE_OLD , S.REAL_NAME, A.BASE_AMOUNT , A.SRV_PART_IN , A.SRV_PART_TOTAL , B.SATISFACTION , B.SRV_PART, C.AWARD_KPI_MONEY , D.FIN_ORDER , D.FIN_ORDER_ROLL, D.FIN_ORDER_RATE FROM sctrans.t_ts_award_base A LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER S ON A.PARTICIPANT = S.ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_PAY_DETAIL C ON A.PKID = C.AWARD_BASE_ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_AWARD_KPI_RATE E ON c.KPI_RATE_ID = E.PKID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_KPI_SRV_CASE B ON E.SRV_CASE_ID = B.PKID LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TS_KPI_PSN_MONTH D ON E.PSN_MONTH_ID = D.PKID where 1=1 <ifNotNull caseCode> AND A.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </ifNotNull>

select sum(srv_part_in) SRV_PART_IN_COUNT, count(distinct ba.case_code) CASE_CODE_COUNT from sctrans.t_ts_award_base ba left join sctrans.t_to_property_info pi on ba.case_code = pi.case_code where srv_part_total > 0 <if test="caseCode != null and caseCode != '' "> and ba.case_code = #caseCode# </if> <if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr != '' "> and pi.property_addr like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </if> <if test="paidTime != null and paidTime != '' " > and DATEDIFF(mm,ba.paid_time,#paidTime#) = 0 </if> <if test="dtBegin != null and dtBegin != '' " > and ba.guohu_time >= #dtBegin# </if> <if test="dtEnd != null and dtEnd != '' " > and ba.guohu_time < DATEADD(day,1,#dtEnd#) </if>

SELECT c.PKID, c.CASE_CODE CASE_CODE , c.CTM_CODE CTM_CODE , pi.PROPERTY_ADDR PROPERTY_ADDRESS , d.name CASE_STATUS , hf.real_HT_TIME GUOHU_TIME , c.ClOSE_TIME CLOSE_TIME , u.real_name ZHU_BAN_NAME , u.username ZHU_BAN_USERNAME , O.ORG_NAME YC_ORG , ci.AGENT_NAME AGENT_NAME , ci.AR_NAME AR_NAME , wf.INST_CODE AS INST_CODE , wf.STATUS AS WF_STATUS , ( SELECT t.end_time_ FROM sctrans.act_hi_varinst v INNER JOIN ( SELECT t.proc_inst_id_ , MAX(end_time_) end_time_ FROM sctrans.act_hi_taskinst t WHERE t.task_def_key_ = 'GuohuApprove' GROUP BY t.proc_inst_id_ ) t ON t.proc_inst_id_ = v.PROC_INST_ID_ AND v.name_ = 'GuohuApprove' AND v.long_ = 1 WHERE v.PROC_INST_ID_ = wf.inst_code ) AS GUOHU_APPROVE_TIME FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C INNER JOIN SCTRANS.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO PI ON C.CASE_CODE = PI.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_USER U ON C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = U.ID INNER JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG O ON C.ORG_ID = O.ID INNER JOIN SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE_INFO CI ON C.CASE_CODE = CI.CASE_CODE INNER JOIN sctrans.sys_dict d ON d.code = c.status INNER JOIN [sctrans].[T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER] hf ON c.case_code = hf.case_code INNER JOIN [sctrans].[T_TO_WORKFLOW] wf ON c.case_code = wf.case_code AND wf.business_key = 'operation_process' INNER JOIN [sctrans].[ACT_HI_VARINST] hvi ON hvi.NAME_ = 'GuohuApprove' --历史变量表 AND hvi.LONG_ = 1 AND wf.inst_code = hvi.proc_inst_id_
WHERE C.CASE_CODE NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT AB.CASE_CODE FROM SCTRANS.T_TS_AWARD_BASE AB WHERE AB.PAID = 1 ) AND c.CASE_PROPERTY NOT IN ('30003001','30003005') <ifNotNull caseCode> AND C.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull prAddress> AND pi.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%'+#prAddress#+'%' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuStart> AND hf.real_HT_TIME >= CAST(#guohuStart# AS DATETIME) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuEnd> AND hf.real_HT_TIME < CAST(#guohuEnd#+' 23:59:59' AS DATETIME) </ifNotNull>
